alert.note: Alert for Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Southern San Luis Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 9:03AM MST until January 17 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches, with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...San Luis Valley Below 8500 Feet. * WHEN...Until 7 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
